original_text: This system logs cryptographic hashes of metadata related to each data-sharing operation.
units: This system logs cryptographic hashes of metadata related to each data - sharing operation .
related to each data - sharing operation

original_text: Although the system maintains immutable logs on-chain, actual data is never stored on the blockchain.
units: Although the system maintains immutable logs on - chain
Although the system maintains immutable logs on - chain , actual data is never stored on the blockchain .

original_text:
*:
  - The system automatically logs data processing activities (who shared what, when, and with whom).
